Articles.Content:
For all you long time users... I've taken the time to sort out a handful of parts from the original R1 release... re-tweaked for use with the new code.

And if that doesn't excite you... maybe speed does.... Just look at bob's face.

Edited August 6, 2013 by InfiniteDice

Really awsome job with the mod, cant wait for it to be updated. This is my truly my favorite mod. And you are keeping us up to date, thank you so much for that . Anyway good luck on updating and what not!

WOW! That is stupid fast for on the water!

Looks like that could be the base for an awesome support cruiser/tinder to the Narwhal. Or an outer net ship since its sooooo fast.

Kinda makes me think we gonna need some ski ramps in the water =P
Dat ship + Pirated weaponry bass cannons = pure awesome.

WOW! That is stupid fast for on the water!

Looks like that could be the base for an awesome support cruiser/tinder to the Narwhal. Or an outer net ship since its sooooo fast.

Kinda makes me think we gonna need some ski ramps in the water =P

You aren't kidding. That's going to be fun to mess with.

What if you have a SSTO craft that is a boat first...launch from ramp then engage the engines!

Oh man I just thought of a part to make for this when it comes out.
Getting closer! I can taste it now! (???) lol

Well here it is... and this calls an end to my desire for speed. (for now) 326.4 in under 36 seconds.

She actually broke 330... but didn't get the pic before I lost an engine.

Edited August 6, 2013 by InfiniteDice

That's knocking on mach1's door right there. That's insane! My RACING jet can't to M1 at sea level...and I think there's no argument that your doing these tests at sea level haha! Starting to rethink the ski ramps...end up with boats in space.

Gosh I wish I could make stuff like that! Sadly I lack the parts! WHY MUST YOU TEST MY PATIENCE!? I jest, but really, are you going to release a quick update or wait and release some huge pack of all sorts of crazy shizal?

all sorts of crazy shizal
That sounds like fun!
Cant wait to Hyperedit a carrier into Munar orbit, just because.
Is there any way I can get past the glitch with the carrier sinking as it spawns? Was a fix released, or is there a new version out? If not, is there any way I can do it in-game?

I can't wait, period

......

Crap I can't find a funny video or image to convey my impatience! I am ruined!

Please read the last couple of pages... .

http://i.imgur.com/sg017lt.gif

Edited August 11, 2013 by andrew123

Please read the last couple of pages... .

http://i.imgur.com/sg017lt.gif

I read them and the only thing eye catching was Infinite stating that he would have the fix up later that night on August 1st. Not saying that I'm holding that against him or anything, just for a second there I was like "YES!" then I saw the date of the post and went "DAMN IT!" I mean ya, it's cool and all that the boat was able to go crazy fast on the water, but I'm just not interested in that. SO WHERE IS THIS UPDATE!? ITS MY GAME! WANT MY UPDATE AND I WANT IT NOW *A person sticks their head out the window* I WANT MY UPDATE AND I WANT IT NOW! *An old man appears* It's your game! Get the mod updated when you want it!

But that gif is pretty awesome.

I read them and the only thing eye catching was Infinite stating that he would have the fix up later that night on August 1st. Not saying that I'm holding that against him or anything, just for a second there I was like "YES!" then I saw the date of the post and went "DAMN IT!" I mean ya, it's cool and all that the boat was able to go crazy fast on the water, but I'm just not interested in that. SO WHERE IS THIS UPDATE!? ITS MY GAME! WANT MY UPDATE AND I WANT IT NOW *A person sticks their head out the window* I WANT MY UPDATE AND I WANT IT NOW! *An old man appears* It's your game! Get the mod updated when you want it!

But that gif is pretty awesome.

Please Avalant, try not to use CAPS, as it comes across the wrong way, please just be patient, ad I'm pretty sure Dice is squashing bugs at the moment. There should be an update soon.

Yes... it's been far too long I agree!

I thought I was close the night I posted the preview video. Then a few issues cropped up and it nearly took me back to the drawing board. I'm now verifying my checklist and double checking for errors/warnings etc. If all is good tomorrow should be the day.
Hehe.. this means that I will soon be able to test my all stock pak-fa.

Yes... it's been far too long I agree!

I thought I was close the night I posted the preview video. Then a few issues cropped up and it nearly took me back to the drawing board. I'm now verifying my checklist and double checking for errors/warnings etc. If all is good tomorrow should be the day.

That must of really sucked. But why did you go and say it will be up maybe tomorrow? Now I won't sleep tonight because of the excitement! XD I kid I kid.

No but really, take your time! You got some really neat stuff on the way that's making the military fanboy inside me squeal!

This is a test.

http://www.flickr.com/photos/100151050@N02/9488484607/

That must of really sucked. But why did you go and say it will be up maybe tomorrow? Now I won't sleep tonight because of the excitement! XD I kid I kid.

No but really, take your time! You got some really neat stuff on the way that's making the military fanboy inside me squeal!

Let's not press the mods. They get fixed when they get fixed, after all... they don't get paid. Dice has gone above and beyond to share with us something that he thought the game was lacking, he didn't have to. I see the " kiddings" but there is a tone of seriousness. We need to chill.

Let's not press the mods. They get fixed when they get fixed, after all... they don't get paid. Dice has gone above and beyond to share with us something that he thought the game was lacking, he didn't have to. I see the " kiddings" but there is a tone of seriousness. We need to chill.

Exactly, it comes out when it comes out, whether that's in 30 seconds or in 30 days.

Let's not press the mods. They get fixed when they get fixed, after all... they don't get paid. Dice has gone above and beyond to share with us something that he thought the game was lacking, he didn't have to. I see the " kiddings" but there is a tone of seriousness. We need to chill.

Pardon me for not making any more clear that I honestly couldn't care less when it came out. I was joking around in that first tid bit in a way to express how awesome this mod is, I mean frikin fully working carriers! In KSP! That's crazy! Anyway, I thought that my last line there was enough to convey my true opinion on the release time, but apparently it was either misread or missed entirely.

So how about you chill out about making sure people don't complain about release dates. No need to get all frustrated and angry over a few whining voices. If anything, that should indicate that there are plenty of people who actually enjoy this add on to such an extent that they actually care about when the next update will be released.

Edited August 12, 2013 by Avalant

InfiniteDice, because of the carrier glitch happening right now I've been spending a lot of time making naval aircraft. I've made one that I'd like for you to use as a sample aircraft.

It can take off in an equally short distance, demonstrated here.

Key bindings:

1 toggles main engine.

2 toggles reverse engine.

Both engines ignite on the first stage.

3 toggles landing gear, flaps (For slowing), and the carrier hook.

4 toggles just the hook and flaps, in case gear glitches.

The missiles are part of the staging.

Another cool photo of the Bullfrog

http://i1299.photobucket.com/albums/ag75/slowlygettingfaster/NF-1Bullfrog3_zpsc09cb408.png' alt='NF-1Bullfrog3_zpsc09cb408.png'>
